Reviews.Title: Pretty good quality for a very good price.
Reviews.Author: AJ McLaughlin
Reviews.Content: Let me start by saying that my television came promptly and in one piece, two days after ordering. I was very happy about that, and even happier that it wasn't busted up into fragments during shipping- so order with confidence.As for the television itself, the picture is pretty amazing. Some say you can't really tell the difference between 780 and 1080 with televisions of this size, but comparing it to my roommates television of the same size, mine looks clearer and crisper. No dead pixels so far and everything looks sharp in HD. It is also worth noting that the television turns on very quickly, without any beeping noises or space sounds.The sound quality is not bad at all. There is an option to simulate surround sound on the tv's speakers, which in my opinion, made it even better. The volume is good enough for me, and my bedroom is pretty large and cavernous. The TV also has enough HDMI ports for all my gadgets: cable box, XBOX, Wii, my laptop- they all fit.This is the only knock I have, and the reason it didn't receive 5 stars: When I went to attach the television stand to the bottom of the TV, the screws were absolutely obnoxious to get into the holes. They did not fit properly or easily and the screws were easily stripped. The end result is that, although it is firmly attached to the stand, it is wobbly and makes me pretty nervous about someone bumping it. If you plan to wall mount, don't worry about it- but I was unhappy with the way the stand was constructed.Still, a highly recommended purchase. The page doesn't say, but the tv comes with a 1-year limited warranty if you're concerned. I am not. I'm happy with my new TV!

Reviews.Title: No customer service
Reviews.Author: John P. Thesz "Cards Fan"
Reviews.Content: Owned my tv for right at 6 months when it failed.  It was under warranty, so I called and the tech showed up the next day.  Great!  He orders 2 boards for it, they take a week.  Ok, fine.  He replaces parts, does not fix, and tells me it is the panel itself, which is no longer made and I have to get a replacement.  Hmmm. He forwards my case to On Corporation (the company that actually makes RCA tvs) and I wait.  Coming up on 2 weeks now, not a word.  I call the number given to me by the tech, answering machine.  I leave daily messages.  Nothing.  Wow.

Reviews.Title: Sturdy Starter HDTV
Reviews.Author: Kevin L. Nenstiel "omnivore"
Reviews.Content: My last HDTV, a Dynex, had problems with murky color in the earth tones. Because of this, half-lit scenes in my favorite shows tended to become unreadable. It made watching suspense shows taxing, but I thought it was just a characteristic of HD. This unit proves that's not so. It has bright, clear colors, and even darkened rooms and caves have enough definition that I can follow the action. It also has clear enough sound that I can enjoy my favorite cable music channels.Several previous reviewers have given this unit bad rates because of their run-ins with customer service. I can't speak to that, because I've had nothing but good luck with this unit, and have had no need to contact customer service. Therefore I can say, with a certain level of comfort, that I approve of this television. It does everything I need a TV to do, and it does it well, without running up my electric bills. Definitely a good, inexpensive TV for families, businesses, and dorms.

Reviews.Title: So far So good
Reviews.Author: JOHN T. GALLO
Reviews.Content: Easy set up directions and hook up.  Screen looks great on hd channels. Sound is decent unless you're a surround sound advocate.  If everything stays the way it came out of the box this was an excellent buy.  It's the perfect size for our bedroom.  My wife just loves. it.

Reviews.Title: The 50 with a KICK
Reviews.Author: Donald Struve "firefighter"
Reviews.Content: In twenty words, Picture Excellent, sound get real hook to home theater AH-SOME!!Use it for TV and Monitor, have HP 21" monitor and Toshiba 24" TV ( I'm a Gamer ) it's Better has 170 view angle. If you have friends, you know what I'm talking about. Finish of my man room perfectly, to the point of my grand kids want to go to grandpa's house more to play andI don't have high speed internet. But I do order the right games from amazon.com. Well no high tec mumbo Jumbo, Have two other TV's 50", Plasma for sports and 55" LCD front main room. Paid a lot more for them one was from Costco this Unit has just as good if not better pic quality. Oh yah the remote is nice and simply with a lot of features. I proud to say I have an RCA TV again. Thanks guys U made my days full of more sunshine.Thanks, Don

Reviews.Title: Good value but...
Reviews.Author: James Norbeck
Reviews.Content: First one had 2 stuck black pixels grouped together dead center of screen. Returned for replacement. Second one has one pixel stuck bright blue in the middle of the screen.The headphone jack on both produces a loud hum along with the sound - checked with multiple headphones. Does not affect the built-in speakers. Also does not affect line-out, but line-out volume is not controlled by the remote. I normally plug my amplifier in to the headphone jack so the remote can control the volume. Now I can't use the TV remote to adjust volume.Otherwise works as advertised and a good value for the price. 4 HDMI ports. Digital tuner is faster and better than other cheap TVs. Still trying to decide about returning the second one to try again, or living with it. Amazon returns make it easy, but I'm concerned that this model is cheap because they knowingly used bad screens and bad headphone jack circuitry. 2 for 2 so far.

Reviews.Title: papa
Reviews.Author: papa7
Reviews.Content: Great,fantastic picture,easy setup,very easy instructions, has four hdmi inputs which is great. It's also very light which made it easy for me to mount it on wall by myself. I still can't believe the picture quality.

Reviews.Title: Very happy camper.
Reviews.Author: Michael Simmons
Reviews.Content: I admit, I'm not very experienced with the varying levels of quality among HDTVs. If it looks good, it looks good - I'm not hard to satisfy. So, I'm glad to say that this TV satisfies that criteria, because it looks great. The display is bright and has plenty of contrast, and the four HDMI ports are especially helpful for someone like me, who has multiple gaming consoles as well as cable boxes and DVD players to hook up to it. If you're looking for a good bedroom HDTV, with full 1080p, this one is a great buy.

Reviews.Title: Quit working after 1 month
Reviews.Author: Clay
Reviews.Content: This tv quit working altogether after 1 month.  Won't even turn on. Pretty pathetic that a brand new tv doesn't last 1 month.

Reviews.Title: Very happy with my RCA HDTV
Reviews.Author: Mark W. Anderson
Reviews.Content: I bought this with some reservation, but the price thru Amazon was so low that I went for it.  I'm very glad that I did.  The tv arrived in two days, as advertised.  Setup was incredibly easy.  The base went on with 4 screws, attached the cable input, plugged in power, put the batteries provided into the remote and then sat back and watched the software do all the rest of the setup.The set has plenty of HDMI and other connection ports, so hooking up other components, extra speakers, etc. is incredibly easy.  Picture and audio quality are very good - probably not the best available, but certainly adequate for my needs.  I would recommend this set to all but those obsessed with having the absolute "best."

Reviews.Title: Great Buy!
Reviews.Author: Uhhhhhh
Reviews.Content: I ordered this on Black Friday and got it the following Tuesday. The setup was extremely easy and the picture is great.I'm not sure why other people would be unhappy with this product.

Reviews.Title: pos!
Reviews.Author: cyunvme81
Reviews.Content: Tv worked fine for about a week. Then one day there was sound but no picture. Called to get it replaced they sent a tech out he couldnt fix the problem had to order another tv from rca. Still waiting it has been 2 weeks. Ugh.

Reviews.Title: Love at first site
Reviews.Author: guitarbrian
Reviews.Content: Well it was my first major purchase from Amazon. This was the item I was most concerned with.  TV=fragile. The box is still perfect. Not one ding or dent on it. I know shocked that it traveled across the country with no injuries!  I opened the box.  Everything was packed super nice. Let it warm up to room temp.  We live in ND.. The temps were below 0 when it arrived.  Install and connection are super easy.. Oh it offers 4 HDMI inputs not 3 as listed.  The colors are super rich. Blacks are black.  The warm colors are warm.  You can adjust your colors to fit your liking. I like warm happy colors.  Cinema view/movie view is so nice and crisp.  The sound is surprising amazing.  I was thinking tin can, small little girl sounding TV.  Well I was wrong keeping it around 18 is perfectly fine for watching and listening to my favorite programs.  The base is sturdy and easy to install in about 5 minutes.  I am very pleased with this purchase.

Reviews.Title: A great TV for the money!
Reviews.Author: Gary L. Iverson, Sr.
Reviews.Content: I just received my copy of this from Amazon yesterday!  Though shipped UPS in the original factory box alone, it came through with only minor box damage.The TV is excellent.  Great color and definition, and so easy to use.  I had it all assembled and operating in 15 minutes (You only have to use a single phillips screw driver to put the base onto the unit.... very easy to do).  Now that I have it, would I buy it again at $230?  I sure would, and I would recommend it to anyone.It has a lot of capability for use with DVD's, CDROMs and your computer, 4 HDMI inputs, as well as at least one of all the other inputs you might need.The remote works perfectly.  It has a 1 year warrantee with the RCA brand, but I still bought a 3 year Sq.-Trade for it for $29.(They cheat a bit: Though it says 3-year, it really only adds 2 years on top of the one you already have with RCA.) But, It is to little a cost for the extended warrantee to not use it didn't make sense.  I also bought a wall mount unit for it for $25 and it is perfect.  The 8 X 8 inch (200mm X 200mm) mounting makes it so easy to do and I love it; it can swing around, and the Amazon bought mounting had 756 reviews.... it was easier than they said to do it - do be sure to counter drill the 2 bolt holes in the wall stud so the 1/4" lags don't split the old wood.  The pre-drill in the wall is the part that takes a little bit extra effort... otherwise it is so simple, all of it, and it works so well!  I gave it 5 stars because it is excellent and the cost is also VERY low for such a fine TV.  Enjoy!

Reviews.Title: So far so good!!
Reviews.Author: Merouan
Reviews.Content: I love this TV. I've had it for a month now. The only complaint would be the sound quality. The picture is amazing, and the price is a bargain.

Reviews.Title: GIft for my son
Reviews.Author: Prinbarbie65
Reviews.Content: this TV was a birthday gift for my son. He is very pleased with the picture and sound quality. This is his first flat screen. I gave it 5 stars for the quality as well as the price.

Reviews.Title: Great Buy
Reviews.Author: hi
Reviews.Content: This is truly a great TV. I found it to be better quality than I expected.  I would buy another one.

Reviews.Title: The price is right, the picture is good ... what's not to like?
Reviews.Author: Shane Monroe
Reviews.Content: I was worried about taking a chance on this TV because of the mixed reviews.  Fortunately, mine came unscathed and working great.  It's mainly a gaming TV for my wife's PS3 - and it looks fantastic.  It's a great value for the price.  The ports are located inset but on the SIDE (left as you face it) so there is no messing around behind the TV once it is mounted - I am VERY appreciative for that.  My only complaint is that the digital out of the TV is RCA type, not optical.  You'll need a converter to change that sucker to optical (about $16 - but needs it's own power) if your receiver or amp needs it.  So far, so good - and my wife is thrilled.  Happy wife, happy life!

Reviews.Title: good tv, looks good, good price
Reviews.Author: deist
Reviews.Content: this is the 2nd one of this model i've purchased.  i like that it is a good value for the price.  reliable and has 4 hdmi inputs.  bought this one "used-like new" and i'm very happy with it.  has a lower response rate that many of the tvs in this price range that do 1080p

Reviews.Title: Great TV for the money !
Reviews.Author: Edward J. Schenk
Reviews.Content: Just arrived at my front door took aprox 1/2 hr to set it up, very light weight and excellent picture quality, 8 screws to put base together and then run setup very easy !

Reviews.Title: Awesome
Reviews.Author: T.W. "Success"
Reviews.Content: Very happy with this 46' tv, omg the picture is great, but the sound isnt so. Glad I have surround sound.

Reviews.Title: burned out and parts on back order
Reviews.Author: brh
Reviews.Content: used the tv very little and for less than a month,  a part burned out.  called for support.  a tech came to out house but had to order a part.  a month later, the part is still on back order.  no tv.

Reviews.Title: No Comment Needed, but
Reviews.Author: Railsplitter
Reviews.Content: This unit has turned out to be a fine upgrade from the old worn out nineteen inch octogenarian that I suffered with for years. It makes everything viewed much more lifelike and enjoyable to watch.

Reviews.Title: Great Display!
Reviews.Author: James Mullen
Reviews.Content: Screen looks great! However the base is very flimsy, and the screw pattern to mount the screen to the base was not correct.

Reviews.Title: Great value for 1080p LCD tv
Reviews.Author: Sirfreudy
Reviews.Content: Purchased this for my teenage son's bedroom for Christmas. I realize that 1080p on a 32" TV may be overkill, I couldn't get myself to purchase 720p. This LCD was a great compromise. Despite others opinions, I prefer LCD as it has a much more consistent brightness across the entire screen. Most cheaper LEDs are lit from the sides and tend to loose their brightness in the middle of the screen. This LCD obviously doesn't have that problem.Things to note:It's definitely not a 'thin' LCD tvNo problems attaching the base or having enough connectionsBox arrived slightly damaged, but the packing was solid. No issues with LCD or dead pixels.Picture quality was surprisingly good - I had lower expectations based on cost, and this LCD exceeded them.

Reviews.Title: Great deal for the price
Reviews.Author: Stephen J. Hamrick "Tunes"
Reviews.Content: The 1080i is excellent.  It would be nice if it had a digital antenna included but we ended up using it with cable so it didn't matter.  Also built in internet would have been nice, but for the price I didn't expect it.It has multiple HDMI jacks as well as a VGA.  It is not clear enough for a monitor but it is great for playing videos from the computer.Very pleased overall.

Reviews.Title: Works great !
Reviews.Author: RJ REMEIKA "AKC dog judge"
Reviews.Content: Great sharp picture <> superior to others I have <> I have both smaller and larger units. Vivid color ok sound.  I should improve sound when I add external speakers soon.

Reviews.Title: What a deal
Reviews.Author: Peggy R. Howell "Peg"
Reviews.Content: bought this as a Christmas present & it is fabulous. Has a great picture and the sound is good too.

Reviews.Title: Great TV for price
Reviews.Author: Michael Mattox
Reviews.Content: I bought this tv as a extra for my home and I have been very impressed. A great picture with outstanding color. What really surprised me was the sound quantity.  This tv has a better sound than my 60" Sharp Aquos!

Reviews.Title: RCA 32" FULL 1080p LCD HDTV
Reviews.Author: Emmalena M. Nowacki "Emmalena M. Nowacki"
Reviews.Content: We Love it.  Great, sharp picture and excellent sound.  The price was fantastic!  Really nice for watching football games and all programs.

Reviews.Title: RCA
Reviews.Author: Rory A. DePass
Reviews.Content: The tv met all my expectations. I was very satisfied that I purchased it. RCA has still got it!!!!! Would recommend it to any one looking for a like tv.

Reviews.Title: t.v.
Reviews.Author: jeff
Reviews.Content: Works great, color is very deep and rich. I recieved it when they said I would. There was no damage to the package and I am very satisfied.

Reviews.Title: No Problems for me
Reviews.Author: Lorraine Parra
Reviews.Content: we have a samsung, a sony, and a panasonic flat screen in our house. cannot tell any difference from those to this RCA.

Reviews.Title: Good TV for the price
Reviews.Author: Harvey W. Casteel
Reviews.Content: We just mounted this in my son's bedroom today so we haven't had much of a chance to see what the quality is, but we have owned many RCA TV's over the years and have zero problems with them.

Reviews.Title: Great buy we dont regret it
Reviews.Author: MammaMia9977 "MammaMia9977"
Reviews.Content: We bought this as an extra for the bedroom. Picture and sound are both perfect and there is really nothing that I can say badly about it. We are not techies, just normal people that want a sharp looking TV. Our other tv is was a $3k Panasonic (55 in) and I really don't see any difference in picture quality.

Reviews.Title: it is fine
Reviews.Author: venno
Reviews.Content: it is fine. Has met my expectations. my brother is happy with it.  And I got it a good price.

Reviews.Title: Excellent TV for the price
Reviews.Author: nicki conover
Reviews.Content: TV has a great picture, sound and color are very good for the price.  It was on sale for a good price and worth it.

Reviews.Title: GREAT TV
Reviews.Author: Ross Edwards
Reviews.Content: I chose this rating, because it has a GREAT picture and GREAT sound. Overall, I haven't found a single thing that I don't like about this TV.

Reviews.Title: Best price for the Product
Reviews.Author: Tony Caso
Reviews.Content: It was just what I wanted & the right price. Other models that only have 720p are selling for the same price as I paid for this

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: Jonathan Reese
Reviews.Content: does exactly what's it supposed to, all the inputs (4) work fine. picture is amazing with no dead pixels. My first flat screen and I love it.

Reviews.Title: Good value for the price
Reviews.Author: Fish On
Reviews.Content: Sharp picture - much better sound than our Samsung.  Remote is OK - too many buttons like most remotes these days..

Reviews.Title: Great value as pc monitor and tv.
Reviews.Author: Jason Davis
Reviews.Content: I agree with others who posted that the sound is "adequate" but not great. However, for under $400 what were you expecting. Excellent value! Works great as a Over-the-air TV and monitor for my mac mini.

Reviews.Title: RCA 32 inch 1080p 60hz
Reviews.Author: Pen Name
Reviews.Content: Perfect size for a tv in your bedroom. Great color and picture quality in HD. Great price and worth buying!!

Reviews.Title: great tv for a great price
Reviews.Author: charlie
Reviews.Content: love the tv so far had it now for a few months and it came right on timee as they said it would and I haven't had a problem with it since I powered it up. very happy and satisfied with this purchase.

Reviews.Title: RCA 32LB45RQ 32 inch HDTV
Reviews.Author: Holly Sparks
Reviews.Content: This item arrived within 2 days after ordering it! It is extrememly lightweight (even a grandma can lift it!), has great color and sound, was extremely easy to set up, and very affordable!

Reviews.Title: VERY HAPPY
Reviews.Author: Gail Drouin
Reviews.Content: Beautiful picture and quality.........very happy with our choice.  Too bad California is making us pay sales tax but oh well. LOVE Amazon.  Wouldn't shop anywhere else.  Find the reviews so helpful to guide me on my choices.

Reviews.Title: A good mid-range tv
Reviews.Author: Average Customer
Reviews.Content: It takes about thirty minutes to set-up this tv, because the stand design, and the fabrication of the stand components, leave a lot to be desired.  That is a non-issue if you mount the tv on the wall.  The picture of this tv is not exceptional, although it is pretty good. The picture adjustments are passable, although they are not great, and they do not help a great deal.  The sound quality, on the other hand, is inferior and almost annoying.  The sound quality is very tinny. It is probably acceptable for conversations, but it definitely is not suitable for music.  Ironically, RCA's claim to fame has been the manufacturing of good sound systems. Again, this would be a non-issue if you use a separate sound system.  All told, this is a good mid-level unit.

Reviews.Title: I loved this TV
Reviews.Author: Candy Borelli
Reviews.Content: I liked the picture, the sound. I would recommend this tv to everyone on amazon.com. It met my expectations ver much.

Reviews.Title: Great!
Reviews.Author: OUtigger "outigger"
Reviews.Content: I love being able to read the scroll and words on the screen.  Sound quality and colors very good, vibrant.  Had it hooked up in a couple of hours, nice change from our older 27 inch for sure!  Quick delivery was nice as well!

Reviews.Title: 1080 lcd hdtv
Reviews.Author: luiz
Reviews.Content: arrived in two days the quality is great wasnt expecting it to arrive so quickly very impressed by the service

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: lil Red
Reviews.Content: RCA 32LB45RQ 32-Inch Full 1080p 60Hz LCD HDTV Arrived on time - easy to set up - brilliant color - great price - Love this for my bedroom!

Reviews.Title: TRULY UNBELIEVEABLE !
Reviews.Author: Sharon
Reviews.Content: I love love love this 32inch rca lcd 1080p tv. I paid about 250.00 for it. OMG the picture is amazing the audio is very clear I love that I have 4 hdmi plugs. I even can hook it up to my desktop. I just bought hdmi cords so I can hook up my WII and dvd vhs combo. It comes in a 2 pack. If you set it up for your dvd player it is very easy to go back and forth.RCA is a wonderful company and has been around for many years. It is reliable and honest.I looked at many other tv companies and other stores Amazon had the best deal, FREE SHIPPING!! when the ups man delivered it he brought it upstairs for me.It is not heavy,was easy to open and hook up took no time at all.Thank you Amazon for your reliable service!! I am truly a happy camper!! I found out the price dropped and I called customer service Sebastian credited me 10.00 which made the price even better!!

Reviews.Title: 46LB45RQ 46-inch LCD
Reviews.Author: Sui Lin Chee "Sui Lin Chee"
Reviews.Content: Bought it from Walmart via their site-to-store service (avoid trucking gorillas tossing it around).  Paid $3_7_8 before state sales tax, and as the lowest priced big screen TV, I took the risk. RCA has been pushed out business since 1986, so it is just a brand that appeals to the Oldsmobile-Buick crowd -  The Gen X & Y would have never heard it it.The set is manufactured for ON Corp. USA in China.  The packing seems pretty good for a large screen TV, and I was impressed with how Walmart treated it in transit to the store.Users have complained about wrong discriptions, and as a product sourced from whatever parts are available, you should expect that.  My set, manuf. 09/2012, has 2 HDMI, NO VGA, 1 combined component & composite input, and optical audio output.  The inputs are side connected on a "hump" in the middle on the set (the actual conectors are about 12 inches from the edge so cables will be out of sight) -  the hump also has the 4 screw holes for 400 x 400 wall mount.This is not a set for critical viewing (as your primary set).The picture quality shows off a HDTV braodcast pretty well (good enough) with "static" imagines like letters, numbers, etc. showing good detail. Light source is CCFL (which is mainly entry level model) provides good brightness, but like ALL LCD's that do not have local dimming (available for top-of-the-line), the always-on CCFL (or LED) will pass light through the LCD panel and constant black levels will be more like dark gray. Again, this is a bedroom or guest room and not for critical viewing.  The most objectionable element is motion lag, which is very noticeable with moving images like sports (balls in motion).  I believe gamers have complained about this (they should have bought a plasma and not ANY LCD).  Channels like ESPN broadcast in 1080i should offset the motion lag a bit.Standard Definition (SD) images were fair - -  if the original broadcast is only fair, it gets worse when it is blown up to 46".  Upscaling a SD 480i image to 1080P usually doesn't improve it despite the 1080 pixels  --  blowing up SD material to 46" on upscaler & de-interlacing circuits in an HDTV that are not top-notch will produced an mediocre screen image.However, a high quality 480P image like a good DVD is displayed well, although clearly color saturation & details are noticeably worse when compared to a 720P, 1080i or 1080P source material.The sound is typical, with down-facing speakers.I have not adjusted the color yet using the old S&V; DVD Home Theater, but the colors are OK out-of-the box.  If you like "pop" (bright & saturated colors), select the "Store" setting.  The "Eco" setting may be too dim for many people and they'll think the image is deffective and try to return the set.The screen is medium gloss, not the flat/matte of some sets, but not high gloss - -  this apparently is important to some people who have sunny rooms, but if that's your situation, you can't do critical viewing in the daytime.Everything about the set is entry level -- owners manual that is a multi-fold pamphlet, cheap carbon batteries (not akaline) and a basic but fairly comprehensive remote control (of course, not back lit).  Buyers have asked about the control codes for RCA's -- the user phamplet shows (in small print) suggested codes for several satellite, FIOS and other service providers.  Otherwise, you can try the "learn function" of your multi-device controller if printed code doesn't work for you.The set is 49lbs (w/o glass/metal stand) and 63 lbs in shipping weight.  I was able to carry it for short distances using the grip holes in the sides; the "box lid" comes off after you remove the 2 plastic anchors so don't cut the box.HDTV sets have a failure rate of 3-8%, and if you're one of them, you will not be happy with the manufacturer as they don't have a repair network and new sets ready to replace the one you diagnose as broken, at least, not at the disposable price I paid.  After many weeks, you will be lucky to have a "reburbished" set sent to you as replacement (BMW doesn't give you a new car even if it's a lemon).The least expensive set I saw was a JVC model (also licensed & not built by JVC) for $4_5_0.  The JVC would probably be better, but I went cheap, and hope the RCA will last beyond 12 months and not be part of the 3-8% that fails.

Reviews.Title: Best 1080 TV I've seen since my mother's
Reviews.Author: Briana
Reviews.Content: After reading the ratings of this tv on walmart's website it was all negative and I couldn't understand why it's an RCA product they have been around for years! It's a great size for my room, the picture is very clear, the sound not the best but only on some channels I guess. I figure if I get a sound system or something it was be amazing! I'm still giving it 5 stars just because I'm amazed with how great the tv going with my room. Now I just need to program the uverse remote to the tv. :-) great job!

Reviews.Title: Good, but....
Reviews.Author: Timothy
Reviews.Content: This tv is cheap, nice, has great resolution, and a AMAZING solid glass tv stand that is a lot better than most tv stands and will keep you tv from falling or breaking and it swivels. When i got this i got free 2-day shipping with amazon prime (I highly recommend this) and it came the next day :) but is was cracked when it came :( and the screen didn't work but so I returned it and it came within three days and it works great overall its a fantastic tv and is very cheap although there are shipping problems so you may have problems with it coming damaged but if you get one that isn't broken then its an amazing buy!!!

Reviews.Title: new 32"
Reviews.Author: Renee
Reviews.Content: Got this for my bedroom and it has a great picture and nothing better then a sleep timer to shut it down when I fall asleep. :)

Reviews.Title: Very, very happy with this TV!
Reviews.Author: Terri
Reviews.Content: Arrived quickly! We ordered 2 and wish we had ordered another one for our room!The tv had all the connections we needed for our girls gaming systems, blue ray and direct tv box.Great price, beautiful, clear picture on tv.Highly recommended, and I just know hubby will order another!

Reviews.Title: RCA 32LB45RQ 32-Inch Full 1080p 60Hz LCD HDTV
Reviews.Author: NMKOW
Reviews.Content: I love my new tv.  It is my first HD flat screen tv.  It was easy to set up, it works great and I have not had any problems at all.  The best part was the price.  I had thought I couldn't afford a flat screen tv but this was only $239.00.  If these on on sale again, I would consider getting a second one!

Reviews.Title: Worked great for 30 Minutes
Reviews.Author: Wayne
Reviews.Content: 32" RCA 32" 1080p 60Hz LCD HDTV worked great for 30 minutes and the audio quit. I used the manual to trouble shoot with no success. I called the 1-888 number in the manual and the tech said I should return the set because of others with the same problem. I returned the set to Amazon and received a full refund.

Reviews.Title: Great TV, needs external speakers though
Reviews.Author: Joshua Lutz "JML"
Reviews.Content: Crystal clear image, awesome build, great connectivity options (plenty of inputs) easy to navigate User interface, fantastic remote, and almost half the price of the competitors. Look, it's 1080 full HD for $600. Buy it. My only complaints are that out of the box there were 7 dead pixels but I've never noticed them, not even one single time while watching and I Don't think this is normal. Speakers rumble on the low end due to simply being crappy speakers. Would have liked to see quality control catch the dead pixels before it ships from the factory though, oh well its a great price so I still think this is the best value out there. Bought it her on amazon 2012.

Reviews.Title: Garbage
Reviews.Author: American Patriot
Reviews.Content: I received the TV at the begining of December 2012.  Well the Mayan Apocalypse hit it on Christmas day.  I was watching a Christmas movie and it died.  No power, won't turn on, no lights, no nothing.  If they can't build a TV that lasts more than 1 month, they shouldn't be in business.

Reviews.Title: Great Picture
Reviews.Author: Bobby C
Reviews.Content: Unpacked it, mounted on the wall, plugged it in and the picture was perfect. Very nice set for the price.

Reviews.Title: RCA 32" LCD TV
Reviews.Author: J. Penney
Reviews.Content: I really dislike rating anything negatively, but when my son ( Receiving this as a christmas gift) told me it was DOA I was very disappointed. so in this case I have no choice. One star is all I can rate it at. I returned it to amazon, with no problem as usual.So with that in in mind I give Amazon 5 Stars, plus 5 more.

Reviews.Title: FIVE STAR RATING OR 1 STAR RATING  I DONT KNOW
Reviews.Author: FRENCHY
Reviews.Content: I really want to buy this TV, but I could not help to notice that most of the reviews are barely three months old. That said i went on Walmart website and typed in the TV model number same thing but more negative reviews due to problem relating to the Mother board and the panel itself, and also serious lack of customer service in response to those issues since the time frame for a five star rating is still in is infancy meaning the oldest review i read about this TV on either Walmart or Amazon were dated late 2012 ( Oct 26 2012) can someone tell me how the TV is actually working for you now that you have had it for at least 4 months.KEEP IN MIND I COMPARED REVIEWS FROM TWO SITE TO DETERMINE THE RELIABILITY, DURABILITY OF THE PRODUCT I WANT TO BUY

Reviews.Title: great tv
Reviews.Author: GA Peachy
Reviews.Content: this tv replaced a 15 year old Sharp tv. The picture and sound quality are awesome. It is very easy to use by my 92 year old grandmother. Well worth the money spent on this product.

Reviews.Title: rca brands will give you a headache
Reviews.Author: Julie Anne
Reviews.Content: this is a nice tv, but you cannot program it with any directv/comcast remotes, or any other type of remotes.  it makes me always have to use two remotes.  not sure what rca has against making their customers able to use other companies' products along with theirs, but had i known this before purchasing this tv i would not have bothered.

Reviews.Title: Highly Disappointed
Reviews.Author: sharon baker
Reviews.Content: Purchased this model on 11/26/2012 and it stopped working 12/15/2013. Outside of warranty so over 300.00 to repair. I only paid about 300 for the t.v.! If you buy an RCA get the warranty-Trust me you will need it!!!

Reviews.Title: Read the specs on sale items
Reviews.Author: Annie
Reviews.Content: Didn't realize when I ordered it that there are multiple versions of a model, some (sale versions) are missing important things like VGA/HDMI ports. I now know to read the specs carefully. Other than that it's been a great TV (once I bought the right adapter).

Reviews.Title: Nice TV
Reviews.Author: Lorrie Harrell
Reviews.Content: Got this TV last year & I am very satisfied! Has a very nice quality picture, is thin & lightweight

Reviews.Title: couldn't ask for more for this price.
Reviews.Author: jeff short
Reviews.Content: this TV is perfect. I have no problem with the sound or the color or anything. it's a nice product.

Reviews.Title: Trusted Company and Best Features vs Price in It's Category.
Reviews.Author: C. Berry "digital_wiz"
Reviews.Content: Purchased as a Xmas present for 2012 for my sister. She went nuts when unwrapped it and still thanks me every time I see her. She has used it with Bluray, PS3, Wii, and as a computer monitor. One year later and it still works like new. Picture is excellent at 1080p and has a large viewing angle. This purchase was well researched before final decision. Bottom line: Trusted company, best features vs price in it's category, and a fair amount of various connection plugs.

Reviews.Title: Horrible!
Reviews.Author: Gretchen Montgomery "Gretchen"
Reviews.Content: I ordered this tv for my living room.  I got it to replace a 40 inch JVC that was 5 years old.  I made sure that I bought the 1080 and that the technology was better than my old tv.The picture movement is horrible.  It makes tv shows and movies look like they were filmed by my cat, because the refresh is so slow.  I get comments by guests all the time about this.The sound is like a toddler yelling inside a coffee can.  It actually hurts our ears when we watch it.  Both the sound and the picture have settings to choose from, none of the settings improve the picture movement or the sound.If I had it to do all over again, I would spend a little more money are pay attention to the reviews.  I did read reviews, but didn't pay enough attention to the comments on the sound.

Reviews.Title: Broke in less than one year.
Reviews.Author: Terry L. Rounds
Reviews.Content: Broke in less than 1 year, very difficult to get in touch with their service department.  Kept getting bounced back and forth between two phone numbers.  Not worth the headache.

Reviews.Title: TV So Defective -- endless back order!!!
Reviews.Author: Raylene Portz
Reviews.Content: Secondary TV not used much and after 10 months no power. Tech ordered main and power board. It's been 3 weeks - just getting the run around. RCA doesn't exist anymore.

Reviews.Title: Works great... When it turns on!
Reviews.Author: SLH
Reviews.Content: Received this 42" LCD RCA/On Corp TV from Amazon in Nov 2012 and after a few months the television would power on to the blue light (as opposed to the red standby mode) but the screen would be completely blank.  I read a few reviews online and some had suggested trying to plug it in another outlet - sounds weird, but worked... eventually.  It still took THREE days of plugging & unplugging and waiting 5 minutes here and 20 minutes there but it did indeed work.  It has then happened at least two other times and the current episode has been over 7 days now.I tried calling for customer NO-service to send someone out for repair.  The only service number in RCA manual will direct you to A&E.; (Apparently, RCA no longer makes TVs and they are manufactured by On Corp US, Inc. and just licensing the name.)  I made an appt for the following Thu (today).  I found out yesterday when they called to confirm the time that Sears will be handling the call in my area because there is no local A&E.; The appt was ultimately cancelled due to a technician's illness at 1:01 this afternoon which happens but after me taking time off work to be here for the 1:00 to 5:00 window.  Best they can now do is Thu Oct 17 and or Thu Oct 24 - both of these days I will be our of town.  I have called Sears to see if there is anyway they can move me up since it was their fault the appt was rescheduled and not due to my inability to keep appt.  I was informed by Sears call center tech that they could not service my TV since I did not purchase it through Sears.  They said I had to go through A&E; for service even though Sears does have me set up for Oct 17th anyway in their system.  I called A&E; back and they said they could not service my TV because it has been turned over to Sears for repair.  I will reiterate that I followed the channels in the RCA booklet for repair and I did not seek outside service for this unit.  Six agonizing hours, conflicting reports on who is responsible for repair, a half-dozen customer service reps telling me they "know how frustrating it is for your TV not to work", and countless requests to speak with a supervisor, I have yet to speak with one at either company and have been put on A&E;'s wait list in case someone cancels on the one day of the week they are in my area.After reading reviews of this and other RCA/On Corp products online, I am not anticipating it being resolved in Oct either.  There is a history of missed/cancelled/dropped appts with these repair companies contracted by On Corp.  If my company operated with customer service like this, we would all be in the unemployment line.  I will ensure I have someone here on the 17th in the unlikely event someone shows up - just in case.  Save your blood pressure and your money and choose another brand with a better record and/or customer service department.

Reviews.Title: Good buy
Reviews.Author: J. Schmitt
Reviews.Content: Works great, decent picture. We have had the TV for over a year with no issues. It was purchased new for around $300; it definitely was a good deal at the time.If you have realistic expectations for how a TV this price should perform, you won't be disappointed.

Reviews.Title: Nice Size!
Reviews.Author: Kim
Reviews.Content: The picture is great quality.  I live in a small apartment, so I have no use for a sound bar. But if you are in a larger space, I would suggest (Again, only if you are not in a small space.) one.

Reviews.Title: Very nice TV for the money
Reviews.Author: Denise Tuttle
Reviews.Content: I would recommend this TV.  Beautiful picture & lots of places to plug in DVD/Roku players, etc.I would have given it a 5 star, but the sound isn't as loud as I would like it, but it is a decent level.

Reviews.Title: Great little extra TV
Reviews.Author: Seth
Reviews.Content: I wouldn't get this as your main TV, but it's a great little TV for your bedroom / guestroom. Nice picture and would recommend as a second TV.

Reviews.Title: RCA 39" LCD HDTV
Reviews.Author: I-own
Reviews.Content: I absolutely love this TV for my size room.  It has lovely color and sound, so this has totally met my expectations.

Reviews.Title: Piece of Crap
Reviews.Author: Jacquelyn C. McNally
Reviews.Content: Google "RCA tv won't turn on" to learn how horrible this tv is! Mine suddenly stopped turning on, as did MANY others!  I always had to turn the dish receiver on first or the sound was muffled. . Just a bad tv! I'll never get another RCA anything. I would have given it zero stars if that were a selection.

Reviews.Title: great product for the price!
Reviews.Author: Casey Bubar
Reviews.Content: No complaints at all. This has great resolution, and my mother-n-law really loves the thing!  Can't beat it for the price!

Reviews.Title: Gets the Job Done
Reviews.Author: Joe Homeowner
Reviews.Content: I was looking for a 32 inch flat screen for the guest bedroom, so I was mainly focused on reliability and price instead of any fancy features or tremendous picture quality.  This is a reputable brand at a good price, so I recommend for a secondary TV.

Reviews.Title: Great TV for the money!
Reviews.Author: bullie76
Reviews.Content: Great picture and decent sound. Got it while on sale so I am happy. The 39" model is perfect for my small den.

Reviews.Title: The perfect Xbox disply
Reviews.Author: espower "espower"
Reviews.Content: To be honest i thought i was taking a gamble but I have experienced nothing negative about this product.  I only use it for my second Xbox at 1080 dpi so I cannot attest to how well it works at a lower resolution but for my needs it fix my exact needs at a very low price for this size display

Reviews.Title: I love it
Reviews.Author: sunflower
Reviews.Content: It works well. I bought it as a present. I use it all the time. I would recommend this TV.

Reviews.Title: RCA
Reviews.Author: OBX
Reviews.Content: BOUGHT TO WATCH THE SUPERBOWL ON CAUSE MY DLP NEEDED A COLOR WHEEL ... THEN MOVED IT TO THE BEDROOM AND ITS PERFECT ... COLOR , SOUND ITS ALL GOOD

Reviews.Title: good product for the money
Reviews.Author: Bobby P.
Reviews.Content: I purchased this product recently and it was everthing that I expected and more. It was easy to setup. Easy to use and the picture is great. Still learning some of the features. But overall it is great. I am very pleased. I will buy another RCA for my bedroom in the future

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: Sonya B Dean "webrose"
Reviews.Content: I bought 2 of these TV's for my teen sons for Christmas. I wanted 1080 and what sold me was the glass base that rotates what came as a surprise is how the kids can hook up their computers and have a 32 in monitor for their games. Have had these TVs since Dec 12 and have even moved them to a new home and they are great!

Reviews.Title: Works great, no complaints
Reviews.Author: Nicole Hernandez
Reviews.Content: bought this for myself last November, and so far it's been working great. I use it in my bedroom for tv, movies, and playing on my xbox. I had no problems setting it up and the sound and picture are awesome.

Reviews.Title: Decent for the money.
Reviews.Author: thedudeabides
Reviews.Content: Clear display. Nice design. Good connections placement on the sides. Only downside is the refresh rate sometimes makes high def images get pixelated. For $200 it's a good deal if you are looking for a high def tv for general purposes and aren't super concerned about the top-of-the-line refresh rates, etc. Overall very happy with it, though will probably opt for a better refresh rate the next time we purchase a t.v.

Reviews.Title: Super TV for a small room
Reviews.Author: P. Harry "epawar"
Reviews.Content: This is a great TV with a great picture. We have had it for several months. My Mom, who is 90, has it on continuously, and it works beautifully.

Reviews.Title: Looking good!
Reviews.Author: R. A. Buley Neumar "Rich the Writer"
Reviews.Content: I got this TV for my son for Christmas.  It's a big purchase, so I read lots of reviews before settling on this one.  He switches back and forth from TV (lots of HD channels) to playing his PS3, to watching YouTube videos on his computer and using this as a monitor.It is a nice TV.  I don't spend a lot of time watching it with him, as it is in his bedroom, but anything I've seen on it is very nice, crisp, clear, and with decent contrast and color accuracy.  I didn't give it the highest rating because the sound isn't the best.  My son tends to turn up the volume too high, and at the higher levels the speakers have a definite buzz to them.  I did think that perhaps he blew the speakers by turning up the volume, but at lower levels they are fine, so I don't think they are damaged, just not great.  If you plan on hooking this up to a sound system, that will make a difference.

Reviews.Title: Great Value!
Reviews.Author: robert w saltmarsh
Reviews.Content: There are plenty of TV's with more features, better sound, etc but this one is awfully good for the price!  The picture quality is very good, it was easy to set-up, and should definitely be considered as your second, third or fourth TV that is watched occasionally.

Reviews.Title: excelent TV
Reviews.Author: Jhonny Lagos
Reviews.Content: Good tv excellent clarity, colors and resolution. Has a 2 HDMI Connections. Very good price-valueI recommend order the Swing Arm TV with this TV

Reviews.Title: Very good quality TV
Reviews.Author: S. Lee "ksallcowgirl"
Reviews.Content: I bought this back in November and this is February now and the TV has worked perfect.  The picture is very clear and bright and I love the color this TV gives off. I would recommend this TV so far!

Reviews.Title: Only two problems
Reviews.Author: Gene Bitner
Reviews.Content: I have been using the set for about a month.  I already knew about the lack of some inputs, so that is inconvenient, but no surprise.  I WAS surprised, however, that only antenna TV and/or cable/satellite inputs-- provide stereo sound.  If you play a DVD or something from a memory stick, there is NO stereo-- the left and right channels are combined :-(On the positive side:  good picture on HD material.  The "favorite channels" up and down is also a handy feature-- when one takes local programming from an antenna-- and does not want to wade through 20 channels when usually watching only four of them.  Set-up from the box is easy, and the rotatable base is a nice feature.

Reviews.Title: Good for the money
Reviews.Author: Julie Stanley
Reviews.Content: The picture is good, I wouldn't say great. The biggest issue with this TV is it only has 1 speaker so the sound is far from premium.  However, I didn't pay a premium price either.  OK for the money.

Reviews.Title: AWESOME
Reviews.Author: Terence McConlogue
Reviews.Content: Great picture and sound for the money.  My kids also use it for video games and they do not complain.

Reviews.Title: Poor craftsmanship
Reviews.Author: Allison Green
Reviews.Content: I just got this package today, and was trying to set it up...and the screws for the base snapped off IN the base! There are also CHUNKS of METAL in the base!

Reviews.Title: Nice TV
Reviews.Author: Jim  Buckley
Reviews.Content: Very nice TV fro the money.  Good picture quality in my opinion. Perfect for a bedroom that doesn't have alot of room.

Reviews.Title: great tv
Reviews.Author: SPOS1
Reviews.Content: This is a great TV. Bought it as a Christmas gift for my brother and he loves it. He hasn't had any issues with it at all. All connects, everything worked great. The packaged the TV so well that nothing was broke or scratched.

Reviews.Title: perfect for son's bedroom
Reviews.Author: Dano
Reviews.Content: We gave this to our son to replace his older TV in his bedroom. He likes to picture quality as well as the fact that it has 4 HDMI ports.This is a good value for a 1080 HDTV.

Reviews.Title: awesome tv
Reviews.Author: bob roberts
Reviews.Content: very nice tv and a nice price also like the swivel base . . . . . . . .

Reviews.Title: Top of the line product. Will buy again from this person
Reviews.Author: alexander
Reviews.Content: I received my RCA LCD 32 inch tv today and it was package very well and delivery was fast. Every thing was in the box and the tv looks brand new with the original plastic wrapper and energy guide label still on the set. The tv is much lighter than other 32 inch lcds and it has a thin sleek design that also looks like a portrait on the wall. The overall picture quality is great. The sound was ok. If you are looking to enhance this tv sound a sound box would be a great addition to this tv as I am shopping around for one now for this set:)The rest of this information does not pertain to this tv set but to some USED TV sets in general when buying from some one else. Some times you will see grainy green pixels on your screen when the tv is being connected using your high definition hdmi setting. Please note, the grainy green pixels has nothing to do with the tv set. Its more of a connection issue that can be easily fixed buying another hdmi cable. I did not have this problem with this set but have experience it with others.

Reviews.Title: RCA flat panel 39LB45RQ
Reviews.Author: RayRay "Ray"
Reviews.Content: I just got my 39LB45RQ today.came,no damage pixel or head phone jack issues.set up was a breeze.Made all of the adjustments and man what great flat panel for the price.One person in a review had problems mounting base and stripping the holes.Caution,just don't over tighten screws.there is avery slight wobble not to worry! unless you have small kids or large cat or dog, I do not. perfect for me.For those of you thinking of the 39"or 42"GO for it you will love it.THE only reason I did not give 5 stars,it only has 2 HDMI ports I need 3.Amazon thank you for all your help getting my flat panel to on time with 1 day shipping.

Reviews.Title: Great little TV/Monitor!
Reviews.Author: Twisty Road
Reviews.Content: I am using this as a PC monitor and it works fine! The tuner doesn't seem to be as strong as my other TV's, as I don't receive all of the channels I would get with my other HD TV's! Has a lot of inputs, I like the EPG (Electronic Program Guide) feature. The USB input does not play video files! :( But its a great little 1080P HD TV for the price!

Reviews.Title: Cheap price, Good picture, Poor sound
Reviews.Author: Denton Lancaster
Reviews.Content: I got what I paid for. The RCA 46LB45RQ 46-Inch 1080p 60Hz LCD HDTV is a good sized LCD TV for a cheap price. Downside is that the pictures that represented it were not of this particular model. I'm not sure what they came from. The pictures of ports/connectors are totally off. There are two HDMI ports, one 3.5 mm stereo headset port, one set of component video in, one set of RCA audio (L/R) in, one USB port, one cable port in and one digital audio out. The built in speakers are very poor! The TV should be used as a monitor only! Oh, I almost forgot, there is no VGA or DVI port if your first intent was to use it as a computer monitor!

Reviews.Title: RCA
Reviews.Author: john Litalien
Reviews.Content: Great Tv for the price,easy set up and great picture quality for the money, would recommend for residential or commercial use.

Reviews.Title: Sports bar living
Reviews.Author: Sandra Barron "Sanbar"
Reviews.Content: Mounted this tv from the ceiling above our 56 inch TV in the living room so that we have "sports bar" effect.  Great picture!

Reviews.Title: RCA  32" color tv
Reviews.Author: James Vawter "sparks_"
Reviews.Content: I originally ordered this as a inlarged PC monitorin my home office.However with a HDMI splitter and composite to HMI converter and a few cables, I've cuppled it to my living room TV which receives Amazon movie streaming. This was a fantastic buy. The resulation is sharp and sound is very good.

Reviews.Title: Very nice picture
Reviews.Author: S. vendange "techie Nut"
Reviews.Content: I bought this for a spare room and I am very happy with it.  The picture is very nice,plenty of HDMI ports the only thing that would make it a five star is if the sound was better.

Reviews.Title: Nice TV
Reviews.Author: D. Turner
Reviews.Content: The television arrived promptly. It was a Christmas gift for my Dad, so it sat around in its box for a few days. Unpacked it after Christmas to set it up. Setting up the television was easy and straightforward. The stand is easy to attach and quite sturdy. The 1080p screen looks a bit fuzzy with an SD signal, but feed it an HD signal and it looks terrific. If you're going to view mostly SD content get a 720p set instead. They look better with SD content, but can't compare when viewing HD programming. The sound is strong and of good quality for a flat screen television. None of them have audiophile quality sound. This one is better than some - really not bad at all. I don't think I would pay the regular price for this set. It was purchased on a gold box special at a very low price before Christmas. For that price it's amazing.

Reviews.Title: Ports not as shown, sound not very good
Reviews.Author: Alex
Reviews.Content: I settled on this TV based on its having a VGA port as shown in the product photos.  This was an important feature for me, but when the TV arrived I found there is no VGA port----  the product photos are of some different TV than the RCA 39LB45RQ 39".  The sound isn't very impressive, the 16 year old analog 21" I replaced had notably superior sound.

Reviews.Title: Excellent
Reviews.Author: metzmatt "metzmatt"
Reviews.Content: We aren't very demanding, but this is a basic TV that gives a clear picture in an attractive appliance for a good price. We use these in our exercise room and second bedroom. I don't know if it would be satisfactory as your primary TV, but for the occasional use in these extra rooms, this is just fine. The brand gets good reliability ratings.

Reviews.Title: Great TV!
Reviews.Author: volume041
Reviews.Content: This is a wonderful television.  The picture quality is superb and clear.  The unit is also quite light weight and can be easily mounted on a wall.

Reviews.Title: I love it
Reviews.Author: shonda b
Reviews.Content: I bought this tv on sale the day after Thanksgiving.  I use it with an antenna, and it works fine.  I manage to pick up a couple of more channels I did not have before with my old tv.  The picture quality is good, esp with HD programs (news and football).  I can attach it to my BB Playbook to watch HD and also my Roku.  I think it was good for the price.  No tax and free shipping.

Reviews.Title: Very Bad speaker quality
Reviews.Author: mrpurcell
Reviews.Content: With a new unit,  I was  and am disappointed in the speaker quality,  the speakers sound blown, very little bass,  rattling,  tried adjusting sound settings, no avail

Reviews.Title: 2 HDMI Ports in the 42 inch
Reviews.Author: Amanda dana
Reviews.Content: Bought this for my husband for Christmas. Contrary to the pictures provided by Amazon and other user reviews, the 42inch only has 2 HDMI connectors and 1 composite. I purchased this TV for the connectivity and was a little disappointed when it arrived and right on the box it says "2 HDMI". Other than that, the picture is great and we couldn't be happier with the TV. The sound is decent-the best choice would be external speakers, but I can't complain for what we use it for. The stand was easy to assemble and it looks great. Great choice for the price, but if you're looking for more connectivity, I might go with a different model.

Reviews.Title: 32"RCA TV
Reviews.Author: Deborah L. Sharp
Reviews.Content: My RCA tv was delivered very fast.  The packaging was very sturdy. I've had it for a year now, and the picture is awesome.  I highly recommend.

Reviews.Title: Bought for daughters room remodeled for Christmas
Reviews.Author: JNBZ MOMMY
Reviews.Content: She had an RCA 32" with built in DVD player but we moved that to the baby's room and bought our older daughter this newer tv.Better picture because its new technology. We tried to buy another tv with built in DVD player but they are really outdatedWe are very happy with this tv. It has a great picture and was easy to install by my husband.He bought a great DVD player that also has net flicks, pandora and smart hub

Reviews.Title: A good deal
Reviews.Author: gezinta
Reviews.Content: The price is right. This is a fine machine. It was easy to set up with on screen instructions, and it is easy to make adjustments if necessary.

Reviews.Title: Wonderful
Reviews.Author: nlbaum
Reviews.Content: Spectacular picture and sound! Excellent price! Buy this TV. You won't be disappointed. Some people commented that putting the stand on the TV was difficult or that the screw holes don't match up. This is simply not true.

Reviews.Title: MY Guest Love it
Reviews.Author: BCR
Reviews.Content: The sound, the pictures and the and very easy to install and program makes it top of the line. My guest recomend it, Very happy with it.

Reviews.Title: Greatest TV I've ever owned.
Reviews.Author: BettyAndAshleigh
Reviews.Content: This tv has perfect sound quality, and MORE THAN GREAT picture quality.  and the price is just a plus Though I bought it on walmart for cheaper. Still, Best tv for the price, and the FANTASTIC quality.

Reviews.Title: The bomb
Reviews.Author: Nicie
Reviews.Content: This tv was everything I hoped it would be. I bought it for one of my bedrooms and I only by Samsung for my house but decided that I didn't want to pay Samsung price for bedroom. I love this tv. Great picture!!!!

Reviews.Title: Good for the price.
Reviews.Author: Chris B
Reviews.Content: The picture and sound are fair. If you are looking for a really sharp 1080p picture save up and something else. If you want to put this in a large room invest in a sound bar or buy a different TV. For my needs this was a good buy on a 32" TV.

Reviews.Title: RCA LCD TV
Reviews.Author: musiclifer55
Reviews.Content: For the price it is a decent TV. The picture quality good, but not as crisp as I'd hoped. Set-up was easy. If your looking for a low priced TV with average quality picture, this might be the one.

Reviews.Title: First HD TV
Reviews.Author: Faithful Follower
Reviews.Content: My son-in-law advised me on this purchase and set it up for me.  I am very pleased with the excellent picture and with the sound.The remote is easy to use and, since I am not tech savvy, that is appreciated.

Reviews.Title: My Christmas present!!!
Reviews.Author: SAQ
Reviews.Content: This is a great TV for me. It works perfect in my bedroom. The picture is EXCELLENT. With the TV being in the bedroom the volume is not a concern. In a larger room , I would purchase a sound bar.

Reviews.Title: Fun Fun Fun
Reviews.Author: Matthew Stroh
Reviews.Content: I have been using a old CRT TV and now I can actually have good pic in a size that fits the room.

Reviews.Title: Excellent TV at great price
Reviews.Author: avidreader
Reviews.Content: A high-quality picture from a known, name brand that I would recommend.  Great price.  We got it during the Christmas season.

Reviews.Title: Makes You Wanna Upgrade to HD Channels
Reviews.Author: Sasha Baranco Mathieu
Reviews.Content: This television is excellent. The HD channels come in beautifully on this baby. It's light-weight & if pushed a little, has some resistance so that it doesn't fall over easily. It found extra channels when doing the channel scan & has multiple inputs/outputs & 4 HDMI ports for computer access & different sound system hook-up options. I can only imagine that the larger-inch tv's are even better. Great quality.

Reviews.Title: Surprisingly Pleased
Reviews.Author: Robert M. Moore "BMoore"
Reviews.Content: Purchased this TV for my daughter's bedroom for a Christmas present. My wife and I were pleasantly surprised at the clarity. We were both skeptical on RCA as we have become big believers in Vizeo TVs, but the price for this was too hard to pass up.

Reviews.Title: Very good TV for the price
Reviews.Author: Michael Miller
Reviews.Content: I have bought two of these TV's. One for my bedroom and one for my in-laws to replace their 10 year old Sony tube TV. The picture is fine for what it's meant for, that being a starter HDTV. If you are looking for a high end TV this is not for you. But if you are looking for a nice TV for a bedroom or something then this is it. The price is great and free shipping on top of that is unbeatable.

Reviews.Title: Great for the Bedroom and my mom loves it
Reviews.Author: Patrick Hinde
Reviews.Content: I purchased this TV for my mom and she loves it.  It went to my sisters house and her husband said it was a great TV.  No issues delivery or connection for my moms environment.  I have had good luck with RCA products in the past and this one held up to its brand.

Reviews.Title: GREAT TV
Reviews.Author: Herm
Reviews.Content: It worked great right out of the box. I would tell anyone who is looking for a 42inch tv that this is a great buy.

Reviews.Title: Easy to Setup and Picture Quality is Great
Reviews.Author: Lyle Justice
Reviews.Content: Got the tv as promised on the delivery date and the box looked pretty beat up from shipment.  I opened, with dismay, and the set was fine. Put the stand on and hooked it up, scanned the channels and it worked perfectly.  I would buy another but I'm sure at the price I paid it won't be around again for awhile.

Reviews.Title: Great  Picture!
Reviews.Author: Hay King
Reviews.Content: Perfect tv for our bedroom. Very bright, crisp picture! The description said it was used with slight damage to base. It looks brand new to me though! Can't beet the value on this item.

Reviews.Title: TV
Reviews.Author: Bev M "Bev M"
Reviews.Content: Great picture replaces an old tube TV this is so much better and neater looking in our bedroom on the wall

Reviews.Title: good buy and good product
Reviews.Author: Wendell W. Glover "wink"
Reviews.Content: This was a black Friday purchase and I got a very good price w/freeshipping and a great little TVI do think you should take a look if you need one this size.

Reviews.Title: Just awsome!
Reviews.Author: Paul
Reviews.Content: This television exceeded my expectations. The picture is just beautiful, super sharp and colorful, maybe some would find it a little too colorful but I personally like it that way. I'm sure it's something you could change in the settings anyway. For a sub $300 TV this was a great deal and I definitely don't regret buying it.

Reviews.Title: good quality for price
Reviews.Author: Kate Hanes
Reviews.Content: I am enjoying this television but think the picture could be sharper.  Color is good and so is sound.  I am pleased overall with the product but I have another brand that seems to have a better HD quality.

Reviews.Title: Great!
Reviews.Author: JAW
Reviews.Content: This was a great purchase for a great price.  I've had no issues with the tv and the setup was super simple.  The picture is much better than the tv I had prior.  So, the picture and sound are perfect for the money!  Hope this helps someone.

Reviews.Title: great TV with one minor flaw
Reviews.Author: Edward
Reviews.Content: Only complaint about the TV is that it doesn't allow you to remove channels you don't watch.  Instead, it lets you set channels as favorites, then you use a separate set of buttons to scroll between the favorite channels.  The favorite buttons are in an inconvenient place on the remote.

Reviews.Title: Sound Issue
Reviews.Author: Rose Fertenbaugh
Reviews.Content: New tv and have a sound issue. Not what I expected for new. This brand use to be of good quality. As with anything today price goes up and quality goes down. We have a tech coming in January. Still and inconvenience.

Reviews.Title: RCA 50" TV
Reviews.Author: Chris
Reviews.Content: it was shipped fairly quick! The picture is amazing.  for the price, I thought it was too good to be true, but it wasn't. Am very pleased!

Reviews.Title: Stressful order
Reviews.Author: Richard F. G. Comie
Reviews.Content: This order was a stressful ordeal, from reaching the address damaged, to the return, then second item sent without invoice,then a request to create it to prevent any damage. This item took six weeks to reach its final destination. theb positive side is that it shows really great.

Reviews.Title: New TV
Reviews.Author: C Rubio
Reviews.Content: I recieved my new TV on Friday evening and by Sat afternoon it was all set up and running like it had always been here. I was very much in need of a new one and I got a awesome deal both from RCA and Amazon. I will be the most popular one of the family. Thank you Amazon for such fast service and thank you RCA for a great product I will enjoy it for many years to come.

Reviews.Title: Awesome
Reviews.Author: Rach87
Reviews.Content: Love my new tv! Picture is great and easy to work! Highly recommend  to anyone looking to purchase a new tv for their home.

Reviews.Title: rca 32" lcd tv
Reviews.Author: Philip Follansbee
Reviews.Content: excellent tv every thing I hoped for, we are retired and enjoy it so much. I would highly recomend it. MERRY CHRISTMAS!

Reviews.Title: Ordered this for our Church and works great
Reviews.Author: C.McCoy
Reviews.Content: This is the second TV that we have ordered for our Church and we have been pleased both times. We were so pleased with the process and the quality of this TV that when we had to purchase the second one we came back to Amazon. The TV that shipped was broken, had to return it, but the process was so easy and timely that will come back if we ever have to by more.

Reviews.Title: Works great
Reviews.Author: Airmedic1
Reviews.Content: We took this TV to our cabin.  Great picture and the auto set-up feature was awesome.  we are really enjoying it!

Reviews.Title: Good TV for the price
Reviews.Author: Jack Baumhardt
Reviews.Content: I got this TV in a box that looked pretty bad with holes in it but it was packed well and has done a great job for the price great picture and I really enjoy that the TV has a swivel. I bought his TV for someone and they liked it so well I got one for me and I am happy with it.

Reviews.Title: Perfect size tv for the bedroom
Reviews.Author: Brian D. Margerum
Reviews.Content: Picture is flawless and the sound is very good. Hookup was painless and sits well on the provided stand. I see this item as perfect for smaller rooms.

Reviews.Title: RCA TV
Reviews.Author: Estella T Brown
Reviews.Content: I love this televison, it's clear and a good bedroom tv, I would recommand it to anyone. Enjoy watching it everyday. Thanks

Reviews.Title: Exceeded my expectations
Reviews.Author: Michael Hiland "Hilander"
Reviews.Content: This little TV is sweet.  It has a fantastic picture, and fits very nicely on the desk in my son's room.  We are using it as a CPU monitor, which is not ideal for this one, but after calibrating the text on Windows a little, it is much better than out of the box.  The pixels on a 32 inch TV are just simply larger than on a 24 or so monitor, making small lines difficult to reproduce.  Otherwise, movies and video look incredible.  Even had to turn down the stock setting for contrast quite a bit!

Reviews.Title: Great TV at good price!
Reviews.Author: Kat Walls "devourer of literature"
Reviews.Content: My husband and I bought this TV (50") for our Christmas present to ourselves this year. It was delivered a day earlier than originally estimated, and brought via private carrier. Several men got it off the truck and into our apartment; they even opened the box and went through a checklist to make sure that everything was in the box and that everything worked. Putting it together on the stand was really simple (we also bought a wall mount for it, but found out after buying the mount that there were no studs behind the wall where we wanted to put the tv...).The television itself is nice and large (great change from our box tv!) and clear. We're avid video game players and chose some of our prettier games to try it out: Skyrim, Halo 4, Arkham City, and Assassin's Creed 3 look just gorgeous on this screen. We also watch Blu rays on our PS3 and they look just like you'd expect it to look--nice and clear. It's so nice to watch blu rays and actually SEE the difference!The set up is simple and easy. The ONLY reason that I'm not quite giving it 5 stars is the sound. It works find, and has HUGE range, but the setup for it is a little odd. If you use the "simulated surround sound" setting you can't hear prominent sounds as well, but hear background noise much better (like you had surround sound--we'll just have to actually GET surround sound). The problem with this is that when playing video games for example, you can barely hear characters talking right in front of you, but you can hear the background noise REALLY well... We tried changing the equalizer around with this setting to see if we could help it, but to no avail... either we just can't work it, or it's not a great sound setting. Other than that, it's perfectly fine. If you remove that setting from the menu, the sound sounds perfectly normal.Overall great tv, great delivery, simple set up, and great price!

Reviews.Title: RCA 37" 1080 LCD TV
Reviews.Author: Janet A. Lawrenz
Reviews.Content: Great TV! Arrived in a few days and we are enjoying the neauitful picture. Great, fast service; excellent product. Would buy again.

Reviews.Title: Great product
Reviews.Author: 2012apocalypse
Reviews.Content: Tv works perfectly! The tv has great picture quality and makes no noise when turning it on or off. I love the stereo sound and the ability to connect my camera or laptop to it and view my pictures or play computer games on the tv.

Reviews.Title: 32 in. RCA TV
Reviews.Author: memeh "memeh"
Reviews.Content: Good TV.  We like it just wish it was bigger. lol  I sure like the slimness of the TV and looks much better in our bedroom.

Reviews.Title: nice picture, good sound
Reviews.Author: joseph degarmo
Reviews.Content: pretty nice picture, better than my 42" toshiba, the sound is very clear and is perfect for my bedroomWould reccommend to anyone!

Reviews.Title: Great Television for a Great Price
Reviews.Author: Charles F Stewart
Reviews.Content: The television arrived as expected. The base was easy to install and the overall feel of the entire TV was high quality. After plugging in the TV prompted me through the setup and that was it. Amazing picture quality. Beats the 42" 1080p LG in the living room. Sound was decent as well. I would recommend this TV for anybody. Xbox 360 looked particular good on this TV.

Reviews.Title: happy
Reviews.Author: Derek Anderson
Reviews.Content: While I wish it had more hdmi options and other hook ups, it was a great investment to complete my bedroom electronics.

Reviews.Title: Works great and a good price!
Reviews.Author: Jon Rose
Reviews.Content: Buy it! I was a bit nervous at first but it turned out great I've had it for 2 weeks now and have add 0 problems. Came on time as advertised with no damage. The picture is great.. Don't be discouraged by the brand..  If you're looking for a smaller TV for a room or dorm, for this price, you need to buy it!!

Reviews.Title: Awesome entry level TV
Reviews.Author: F.Deluca "F.Deluca"
Reviews.Content: This TV has an entry level price, but is packed with a bunch of features. For the price you won't get any better. HD channels loop pretty good on this 1080p TV and also bluray playback looks very sharp. You also have all the inputs/outputs you need, 2 component, 4 HDMI, 1 VGA, 2 analog audio and 1 digital.I also love the remote control, it is very easy to operate and doesn't feel clunky. Viewing angles and black levels are good enough. I have a mid range HDTV on a different room that looks just about the same.Again, for the money this is probably the best choice.

Reviews.Title: Affordable TV and good quality for the price
Reviews.Author: L Ingalls
Reviews.Content: I purchased this tv for our guest bedroom for when my parents visit.  It was affordable and full HD so I tried it.  I have been pleasantly surprised and so far there are no issues at all.  At this point (6 months in) I would buy one again.

Reviews.Title: Heads-up: There are only -2- HDMI Ports
Reviews.Author: Longview "Longview"
Reviews.Content: Negatives:1. When I received this TV I found that there were only "TWO" (2) HDMI ports on the TV NOT the 3 -currently- listed in "Features" above or the 4 seen in the photo above.  (You can also double check the number of HDMI ports online at the RCA website for a "Model 32LB45RQ RCA 32 inch 1080p TV".)2. I received mine with a dead pixel on the screen.Positives:1. This had a great picture for a 32 inch TV.  Full 1080p did seem to make a difference.2. The stand is easy to attach and allows you versatility in ability to swivel and in the option (via screws) to control how much play or tightness you allow.

Reviews.Title: Very Good
Reviews.Author: chazz "motown freak"
Reviews.Content: I purchased this as gift for my brother. I was able to view it recently. Great picture. He only uses a tv antenna(no cable). Reception is great. Nice having the 3 hdmi outputs for future use.

Reviews.Title: Excellent LCD tv
Reviews.Author: Alisha Seefeld
Reviews.Content: Great price, excellent quality and they even took it out of the box and plugged it in to make sure it worked!

Reviews.Title: great hdtv
Reviews.Author: R. Taylor
Reviews.Content: This 1080p LCD hdtv is great for the price, I can now play my ps3 games the way they was ment to be played in full hd.

Reviews.Title: Perfect.
Reviews.Author: Ken
Reviews.Content: I got this TV on sale, and I can't say enough about it. It works perfectly. I can switch from my regular channels, to my xbox, to my PS3, to my PC with ease. Picture looks great, and it's the perfect size for where it's at in the house. If you can get a good price on it, snatch this TV up. You won't be disappointed.

Reviews.Title: Good picture but minimal features
Reviews.Author: Howard P. Webb
Reviews.Content: I convinced my mother to buy this set for my dad as his old tube TV was going.Before I go any further I would like to say this TV sells for $298 everywhere else and I deducted a star for the $400 amazon pricetag.I need a simple TV for my non tech savvy elderly parents. They have standard cable and dvd player and that's it. So I figured all I needed was a cable jack and 1 composite input for the dvd player and this tv has that along with a nice picture.I thought this was perfect for their needs and convinced them to get it. While setting up the TV I found one glaring omission....no audio output. The standard red/white RCA jacks are simply not there; only a headphone jack and digital audio output.Well my father is hearing impaired and uses an in ear wireless headset that you might have seen people using at the movies and it connects to the TV with....you guessed it the standard red/white RCA jacks that every TV new and old that I have seen came standard. So we may have to return it as adding a digital receiver would only serve to further confuse my already tech confused parents.As far as inputs go to component and composite jacks are "shared" not separate inputs and it only has 2 hdmi inputs.This would make for an excellent backup TV or one dedicated to a kids xbox but it's just too limited on inputs/outputs for anything more.At $298 I would rate this 3 stars but at $400 no way

Reviews.Title: As Advertised
Reviews.Author: elizabeth herboldsheimer
Reviews.Content: Received merchandise w/Prime 2-day delivery.  Arrived in original, untouched package.  Easy to assemble.  Easy setup.  My wife said it had the best picture she's ever seen on a TV.  Periphials detected and easily set up with HDMI cables.  Only question is that my ROKU, with analog cables, only displayed in black and white.  May have been my fault:  dunno.Price, quality, delivery couldn't have been better.  The negatives I'd seen, sound, remote, damage, were not evident on my unit.  Should anything change, I will edit and continue my review.

Reviews.Title: Great TV at a Great Price
Reviews.Author: Blue Hen 2011
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my dad for Christmas. We have a 42" version of the same TV in our living room. It provides a great picture and is at a great price. The only negative we've perceived is the sound on these TV's is pretty weak but I understand that that is typical for flat screens.

Reviews.Title: Nice, except the bezel cracked
Reviews.Author: Richard Griswold "intentionally_left_blank"
Reviews.Content: We bought this as a Christmas gift for our grandma to replace her old tube TV.  Setup was painless and she was really impressed with the picture quality, however the volume isn't loud enough for her, and the bezel cracked a few days after we received it.  We've sent it back for repairs.

Reviews.Title: Excellent product!
Reviews.Author: George L. Freeman
Reviews.Content: It's a great TV that my kids love in their play room. It was very easy to install and run.

Reviews.Title: Good value for cost
Reviews.Author: Tom in Germantown
Reviews.Content: I am very pleased with the tv so far. A previous reviewer complained about the screws not aligning when installing the mounting bracket. I found the fit to be tight (which is actually better) but I took my time & started the 1st screw (but not tightened) & did the same with the other 3. When all were started I gradually tightened them in rotation until all were tight.I haven't had any problems so far & I feel this is a good value for the cost.

Reviews.Title: The TV is okay, but the picture is grainy.
Reviews.Author: Craig Walker
Reviews.Content: The TV showed up in a timely manner, but the packaging showed quite a bit of damage.  I didn't even open the box until I got approval fro the customer service department.When I hooked the TV to my cable service, I was a little disappointed with the picture quality as it seemed a little grainy.  The grainy apperance is as compared to my Samsung Plasma and my Vizio LCD 720p TV.  I guess the pictue is okay for the price, but I would not buy this TV again.

Reviews.Title: works for me.
Reviews.Author: J. Skilton
Reviews.Content: UPDATE (1/7/13):  Only problem so far is completely intolerable AC hum in the earphone out.  Have to plug headphones into the external sound system, which gets audio in directly from cable box / Roku.  Everything else working fine.  -very- good TV for the price.I really don't understand all the whining about assembling the stand.  I won't be snarky, because I all too often experience sudden acute motor skills failure.  But - and I am a guy who hates to read instructions - 15 minutes after opening the box, the TV was standing upright, displaying a program delivered via HDMI cable from my Roku.  Use a reasonable amount of care and a magnetic #1 Phillips, and it's not hard at all.  My only hitch was that the HDMI plugs are pretty tight, and I didn't get the cable plugged all the way in on the first try.I have an older 42" Sony, and the picture on this thing beats it cold - sharp, deep blacks, bright colors.  RCA has always been known for vivid reds, and this is no different.  The sound doesn't totally suck, but it definitely isn't nearly as good as the picture (or the Sony).  I routed the Roku's component audio out through the Aux port on a Teac table radio - problem solved (except the part where I need two remotes).  One day, I'll read the manual, and see if there's an audio out on the TV that's controlled via the TV remote.In short, it's only been a day, but I'm very happy with the purchase.

Reviews.Title: Great value
Reviews.Author: Jx
