Reviews.Content: $230 for a 32 inch 1080p tv was a fantastic value. 4 HDMI inputs are perfect for hooking up all my toys. Arrived quickly, in great shape, very easy to setup. Picture looks really good. Sound is a little quiet, but for a bedroom it's perfect. Hope everything holds up.

Reviews.Title: Horrible
Reviews.Author: thomas doolittle
Reviews.Content: Owned less than a month the audio video messed up and the hdmi slots did not work and one of them melted both ends of my hdmi cord

Reviews.Title: Warehouse deals are no deals sometimes
Reviews.Author: Bryan  T "BT"
Reviews.Content: The TV itself is great. My problem was the neck for the stand and the attaching screws were not included. I tried contacting RCA but they insisted the serial number did not exist and refused to help. Found the parts from a 3rd party seller on Amazon for $45 and asked Amazon for a refund to cover the cost.  Denied!!  Ended up buying a generic wall mount at Wal-Mart and will just keep it on the wall. Bummer! I will not purchase another item from Warehouse deals. Saved $20 over new but it ended up costing an extra $50 for the mount.  Should be "Warehouse no deals" in my book.

Reviews.Title: Broken within 4 months
Reviews.Author: Olivia Dorothy
Reviews.Content: This TV started acting funny, not always turning on, within 3 months.  Called RCA and it took them 2 months to get a service man out, by then the TV would not turn on at all.  3 months after the first visit and 2 repair man trips later, RCA finally agrees to replace the TV.  When the new TV arrived, it was cracked across the front.  After 5 months without a TV, I'd rather just have a bleeping refund.  Not buying RCA again.

Reviews.Title: Not enough Details
Reviews.Author: Shone Maddox
Reviews.Content: The tv was not detailed in what it needed, stand and remote. Ended up having to buy both. Was not happy with the additial purchases

Reviews.Title: best present my Husband received
Reviews.Author: Choruk Diryc
Reviews.Content: picture quality is great, size is huge for our bedroom. My husband loves playing Xbox games on it from the bed... now he expects a bigger tv for the living room!

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: Celeste Wynn-Roberson
Reviews.Content: I'd recommend this product to anyone! Its got good sound and great color. I love it and I'd buy another.

Reviews.Title: great picture terrible audio
Reviews.Author: eric
Reviews.Content: The audio on this set is deplorible. You can get a better tv for your money. Do not buy this unless you're deaf.

Reviews.Title: RCA HD TV
Reviews.Author: Joseph Mangiacotti "Joseph Mangiacotti"
Reviews.Content: This is one Great Television. I owned many TV's but none compare to this. It's a joy to use. I can't believe how little I paid for this TV. It's worth twice as much and that's what I expected to pay.

Reviews.Title: Very Nice TV
Reviews.Author: Steve Crone
Reviews.Content: Very nice 1080 TV for the price of a 720Great Picture - Easy to set up.  Just right for the bedroom!  I would recommend!

Reviews.Title: Good TV for the $$$
Reviews.Author: Jay
Reviews.Content: The TV arrived undamaged. It was easy to set up and it looks and performs very well. Good value. recommended

Reviews.Title: GREAT TV
Reviews.Author: ps3 fixter
Reviews.Content: THIS TV WAS A GREAT VALUE. I I I I I I I I I I I I I I

Reviews.Title: Wonderful
Reviews.Author: Lonna Dunavan
Reviews.Content: My 16 year old needed a new tv to be able to take to college next year.  His little 19 inch was causing him to squint too much. Great tv for the price! I would recommend it!!

Reviews.Title: Tom graham
Reviews.Author: Tom
Reviews.Content: I ordered this for my bedroom,I am totally happy with it.The picture is crystal clear, easy to use.My wife  is also happy with this product.

Reviews.Title: My TV
Reviews.Author: Devonavich86
Reviews.Content: Arrived in a timely fashion. The picture is great with an easy setup. I couldn't be happier. I've had the tv for about 2 months now in my apartment, but if I did have a bigger place I'd probably go with a larger screen. But fine for the size room it's in.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: Marilyn Dery
Reviews.Content: The TV I bought is great.  Hooked it up in no time flat and it was delivered to my door.  No hassle of carrying aroung those huge boxes.  I would recommend buying a TV online to anyone who is doubtful.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: Allen R. Axline
Reviews.Content: This TV replaced a 15 year old 50# tube type.  With new set top box and HDMI cable, I'm a happy camper.

Reviews.Title: GREAT TV!! We are very happy with our purchase and the price was perfect!
Reviews.Author: mommyknowsbest
Reviews.Content: This tv was slightly cheaper than the local big box's "sale" price and it was free shipping. Once we received it we realized it was definitely the right choice. It has a very nice clear picture and decent sound. I am very happy with this purchase!! Wish I would've done this earlier instead of the dinky 26" generic brand tv I previously purchased in a brick and morter for the same price!

Reviews.Title: only 2 HDMI ports
Reviews.Author: fernando barriera
Reviews.Content: i 1st went to K mart and got the 39-inch rca (39LB45RQ) witch is the same tv but smaller i had to return it cuz it said it had 4 HDMI ports and need 3 or more but it only had 2 so i came here and paid a bit more for this tv it said it had the 3 i needed and it came once agian only 2 HDMI ports,i dont think its amazons misake its RCA givning the wrong info on the product.

Reviews.Title: rca tv
Reviews.Author: Duracell12
Reviews.Content: Quality wasn't good at all. Item was damaged as well. Was not happy at all because I thought I was getting a deal.

Reviews.Title: arrived with cracked screen......
Reviews.Author: S/O
Reviews.Content: I can not rate the TV on its performance, but arrived with a large crack in the screen. Poorly packaged....Amazon was excellent in sending a shipping label and quick refund, but overall an inconvenience....when I went back to try and repurchase...price went up....

Reviews.Title: WONDERFUL TV
Reviews.Author: linny
Reviews.Content: WOW!!!!!! I AM REALLY IMPRESSED WITH THE RCA 32" TV I RECEIVED TODAY.I BOUGHT ONE FOR EACH ROOM IN MY CAMPER. THE PRICE WAS SO GOOD I COULDNT PASS IT UP. THE TV LOOKS AMAZING. THE SPEAKERS ARE PLENTLY LOUD. FOR $239.00 I CANT FIND ANYTHING I DONT LIKE ABOUT IT AND HIGHLY RECOMMEND IT.

Reviews.Title: MORE RCA GARBAGE
Reviews.Author: David "obxdj"
Reviews.Content: I had 2 RCA tv's. Both Broke within a month of each other. RCA said sorry but there is nothing we can do. RCA does not stand by their products. They used to be a quality brand name. Now all they make is junk. AVOID ALL RCA PRODUCTS.

Reviews.Title: Hope you don't have any issues with their GREAT deals
Reviews.Author: C. Wooldridge "C Wool"
Reviews.Content: Our TV was damaged upon delivery.  Only option was to return it.  Nothing was offered as a replacement so we are left inconvenienced on Christmas, and have to go a find a new tv ourselves because the 'special" tv was out of stock.  Its fun explaining to your child a return policy from Amazon.  I will never order a large purchase item from Amazon again.

Reviews.Title: DONT BUY THIS!!!!!!
Reviews.Author: andres
Reviews.Content: I trusted amazon and rca buying this but now it seems this model have a "common" issue and no one is taking responsability, today 3 days before christmas the only option they have is to make a refund. So if they know about this issue why do they sell this????

Reviews.Title: Not a quality TV
Reviews.Author: KC
Reviews.Content: TV worked fine for 5 months until screen faild. Just 2 months after warranty ran out. According to Consumer Reviews this is a commen problem (662 negitave reviews).

Reviews.Title: rca 46
Reviews.Author: this guy
Reviews.Content: Wasn't capatible with any.of the older equipment In my house and.picture quality was less than expected audio was very good tho

Reviews.Title: TV
Reviews.Author: Jeff M Spears
Reviews.Content: It was broken when I received it.  2 different times by the way.UPS did a bad job both times.  Even the box was damaged.They were almost not careful on purpose it seemed.

Reviews.Title: Sipping
Reviews.Author: Cathy Christensen
Reviews.Content: Box was busted up not sure if the tv works yet.  Will keep you posted after the present is opened

Reviews.Title: Dead on Arrival
Reviews.Author: C. Nguyen
Reviews.Content: I ordered this junk on 10/08. Amazon shipped it so quick so I received it on 10/12. I plugged in the TV and all I got was line tearing, and massive flickering. Big piece of junk. Don't waste your time and cash on this crap.

Reviews.Title: Stay the hell away from RCA!!!
Reviews.Author: Joshua S. Meyers
Reviews.Content: Purchased the 32 inch 32LB45RQ model BRAND NEW from Wallmart. Opened the box, set the TV up, plugged my gaming PC into it, turned the TV on and instantly found a dead pixel. Needless to say I am furious. I have never seen a BRAND NEW TV have a dead pixel right out of the box on it's very first start up. this is extremely pathetic quality from RCA. It's extremely noticeable especially when browsing the internet since most pages have a white background. Do not buy anything from this company!!! As I'm typing this I notice something incredibly strange... about half of the letters I'm typing are blue instead of black... All I can say to that is WTF??? So weird. Wish I could give zero stars but that's not allowed so 1 star will have to do. On another note my 60 inch Panasonic 3D TV model number TC-P60ST30 is THE BEST TV I have ever owned hands down. 3D movies look incredible with the active shutter glasses. The black levels are just as dark as the black plastic around the edges. If the screen is all black you can't even tell the TV is on at all. The color quality is outstanding. If you are worried about burn in (video game people I'm talking to you) don't even worry. Burn is doesn't even exist on Panasonic TV's at all. I can guarantee this. My brother plays Xbox 360 on it every single day and sometimes he will leave the room and leave the TV on for over 4 hours straight lol. He does this on a daily basis also and the TV still runs flawlessly. No wonder Panasonic gets TV of the year from CNET year after year. I have never seen a better TV yet... Sony TV's are total crap compared to Panasonic. LED LCD's can't touch the quality of this TV especially the black levels.

Reviews.Title: Where's my TV?
Reviews.Author: Anne Marie Robol "Operation Sunshine"
Reviews.Content: I still don't have it. I don't know where it is.  Could have gone down to Wal-Mart and brought it home.

Reviews.Title: Do Not Be Seduced by the Price
Reviews.Author: Robert Sprague "Rob Sprague"
Reviews.Content: Out of the box, the  first thing the poor, unsuspecting, buyer must do is attach the base.  Do you have a degree in mechanical engineering?  No?  Well then, good luck to you.  Imagine a name-brand TV manufacturer that cannot even get the TV base right.  Eight holes that do not line up.  So maybe, like me, you are an inventor and you can jury-rig something to make your TV stand up straight.  Plan to invest about 4 hours on this. And open a bottle of wine.By the way, the sound is very tinny but the picture is good, so you can turn the sound down to zero and, since the picture is OK, you can read the actors' lips.Or you could do something else...something better...you could choose a better TV.  Do not be seduced by the price of this poorly-made offering.

ProductInfo.Features:
39 - Inch LCD Full 1080p HDTV
2 HDMI Connections
Resolution: 1920 x 1080
Tuner Mode: ATSC/NTSC
Contrast: 3000:1
ProductInfo.Name: RCA 39LB45RQ 39-Inch LCD Full 1080p 60Hz HDTV (Black)
